INDY FRESH CATERING MENUS

Local meals made from scratch every day

MAY WE TAKE YOUR ORDER?

There’s a whole lotta love that goes into each Indy Fresh Catering dish. Taste the freshness in our quality menu items crafted to cater to all of your corporate or private events in Central Indiana. Below, you’ll find an extensive array of affordable a la carte menus to peruse and choose from. Orders of $150 or more receive free delivery.

Questions? Ready to order?


FULL PRINTABLE MENU
CONTACT US


BREAKFAST

It’s time to kick off the day with delish offerings that range from gourmet scrambled eggs to fresh-baked croissants.


VIEW BREAKFAST

APPETIZERS

Your guests won’t want to pass on any of these apps and hors d’oeuvres, such as bacon-wrapped meatballs and imported cheese platters.


VIEW APPETIZERS

ITALIAN

Our Italian cuisine—think baked ziti, chicken parmesan and Italian sausage peppers and onions—has always been a huge hit with Indy Fresh customers and staff alike.


VIEW ITALIAN



BBQ & GRILL

For a casual meal with tons of flavor, check out our barbecue selections including locally sourced pulled pork with Indiana’s JohnTom’s award-winning sauce.


VIEW BBQ & GRILL

SOUPS & SALADS

Warm up with one of our savory soups or chill out with a cool and crisp salad, and add a dollop of extra flavor with a made-from-scratch dressing.


VIEW SOUPS & SALADS

SANDWICHES & WRAPS

It’ll be tough to choose from the all of the super-fresh sandwiches and wraps on this menu! Did we mention there’s a hot slider buffet option, too?


VIEW SANDWICHES & WRAPS



SIDES & DESSERTS

Top off an incredible meal with Indy Fresh Catering’s sides and desserts. Trust us, you won’t want to miss out on these house-made delights!


VIEW SIDES & DESSERTS





DIETARY NEEDS

Does someone in your group have a special dietary need, intolerance or food allergy? Please give us advance notice and will do our best to accommodate them! We have gluten-free, dairy-free, vegan, vegetarian and more options. And please note that all meals will be cooked in the same kitchen facility.

Ready to Place Your Order?
